availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Engraving and lithography firm. Founded in 1847. Operated as Middleton and Wallace from 1849 to 1854. Operated as Middleton, Wallace, and Company (Lithographers) from 1854 to1858. Operated as Middleton, Strobridge and Company from 1858 to 1865. Operated as Strobridge, Gerlach, and Wagner from 1865. Founder: Elijah C. Middleton. Partners: Elijah C. Middleton, W. T. Wallace, Hines Strobridge, Martin B. Ewing, Domonique C. Fabronius.

ab.bibl: “Guide to the Strobrige Lithographing Company Advertisements,” Duke University Libraries, https://library.duke.edu/rubenstein/findingaids/strobridge/ (accessed January 29, 2020).
